attributes.action: to bring criminal charges against benefit cheating MP'S
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I request that all mps who have cheated on the benefits they enjoy should be charged with a criminal offence ie (fraud ) if we ordinary people had done what they have done we would either be on bail from the police or in prison for cheating the benefit system. I see no difference between the two benefits we ordinary taxpayers have paid for both benefits. Difference is mps are not held accountable.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
